explains: n. 掩藏，掩饰；伪装，化装；欺骗；化妆舞会

sentences.en: The good folks come probably from a masquerade!
sentences.cn: 好人大概是从化装舞会来的吧！

sentences.en: He told a news conference that the elections would be a masquerade.
sentences.cn: 他在记者招待会上说选举将是骗人的把戏。

sentences.en: Once into the voicemail system, they could masquerade as owners.
sentences.cn: 一旦转入语言系统，他们就可以摇身一变成为成电话的主人。
